mapper.select: select * from t_cell_weight_info where cell_code = #{cellname} and yyyyMM = "201708" limit 1

SELECT indeicator_name,cell_code,range_00,range_01,range_02,range_03,range_04,range_05,range_06, range_07,range_08,range_09,range_10,range_11,range_12,range_13,range_14,range_15,range_16, range_17,range_18,range_19,range_20,range_21,range_22,range_23 FROM t_normal_model_detail_info INNER JOIN t_normalcheckmetadata ON t_normal_model_detail_info.indeicator_code = t_normalcheckmetadata.indeicator_id WHERE t_normalcheckmetadata.in_used = 1 AND t_normal_model_detail_info.indeicator_code = #{indexcode} AND t_normal_model_detail_info.cell_code= #{cellname} limit 1
SELECT * FROM t_groupDetailInfo WHERE cell_code = #{grouptype} AND indeicator_code=#{indexcode} limit 1
